member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Helpers.BaseEntity
member.summary: Base class for all domain entities.
member.remarks: Provides common audit and lifecycle properties shared across entities, including soft deletion and timestamp tracking.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Helpers.BaseEntity.IsDeleted
member.summary: Indicates whether the entity has been soft-deleted.
member.remarks: Soft-deleted entities remain stored in the database but should be excluded from active queries.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Helpers.BaseEntity.DeletedAtUtc
member.summary: UTC date and time when the entity was soft-deleted.
member.remarks: Null if the entity has not been deleted.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Helpers.BaseEntity.CreatedAtUtc
member.summary: UTC date and time when the entity was created.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Helpers.BaseEntity.UpdatedAtUtc
member.summary: UTC date and time when the entity was last updated.
member.remarks: Null if the entity has never been updated.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Quiz
member.summary: Represents a quiz consisting of multiple questions.
member.remarks:
A quiz is identified by a unique name and contains an ordered collection of questions defined through the join entity.
Questions can be reused across multiple quizzes.
Inherits audit and soft-delete properties from .

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Quiz.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the quiz.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Quiz.Name
member.summary: Name of the quiz.
member.remarks: Defined during quiz creation and can be updated later.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Quiz.QuizQuestions
member.summary: Navigation property representing questions included in the quiz.
member.remarks: The relationship is managed via the entity, which preserves question order using a display index.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Question
member.summary: Represents a quiz question stored in the system.
member.remarks:
A question consists of textual content and a correct answer.
Questions can be reused across multiple quizzes through the relationship entity.
Inherits audit and soft-delete properties from .

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Question.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the question.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Question.Text
member.summary: Text content of the question.
member.remarks: This represents the visible question presented to participants.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Question.CorrectAnswer
member.summary: Correct answer for the question.
member.remarks: Stored internally and not included in participant-facing exports.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Question.QuizQuestions
member.summary: Navigation property representing quizzes that include this question.
member.remarks: Implemented through a many-to-many relationship using the join entity.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.QuizQuestion
member.summary: Represents the relationship between a and a .
member.remarks:
This entity acts as a join table in a many-to-many relationship while also preserving the display order of questions within a quiz.
Each record defines: - Which question belongs to which quiz - The order in which the question appears
Inherits audit and soft-delete properties from .

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.QuizQuestion.QuizId
member.summary: Identifier of the quiz.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.QuizQuestion.QuestionId
member.summary: Identifier of the associated question.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.QuizQuestion.Quiz
member.summary: Navigation property to the related quiz.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.QuizQuestion.Question
member.summary: Navigation property to the related question.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.QuizQuestion.DisplayOrder
member.summary: Determines the position of the question within the quiz.
member.remarks: Questions are displayed in ascending order based on this value.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Enums.SortOrder
member.summary: Defines sorting direction for paginated queries.
member.remarks: Used when retrieving paged results to determine whether data should be sorted in ascending or descending order.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Domain.Enums.SortOrder.Asc
member.summary: Sort results in ascending order.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Domain.Enums.SortOrder.Desc
member.summary: Sort results in descending order.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExporterInfo
member.summary: Represents metadata describing a quiz exporter.
member.remarks:
Contains descriptive information about an exporter implementation such as its unique key, display name, file extension and MIME type.
Instances of this class are typically created based on MEF metadata and exposed through the API to inform clients about available export formats.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExporterInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: File extension associated with the exported format.
MIME type used in HTTP responses for the exported file.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExporterInfo.Key
member.summary: Unique exporter key used when requesting export.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExporterInfo.DisplayName
member.summary: Display name shown to clients.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExporterInfo.FileExtension
member.summary: File extension of the exported file.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExporterInfo.MimeType
member.summary: MIME type used in the HTTP response.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExportResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a quiz export operation.
member.remarks:
Encapsulates the generated file content along with its file name and MIME type, which are used to construct an HTTP response for file download.
Designed as an immutable value object.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExportResult.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Binary content of the exported file. If null, an empty byte array will be used.
Name of the exported file. Defaults to "export" if null or empty.
MIME type of the exported file. Defaults to "application/octet-stream" if null or empty.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExportResult.Content
member.summary: Binary content of the exported file.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExportResult.FileName
member.summary: File name used in the Content-Disposition header.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.ExportResult.MimeType
member.summary: MIME type used in the HTTP response.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IExporterCatalog
member.summary: Provides access to available quiz exporters.
member.remarks:
Responsible for discovering and exposing exporter implementations, typically loaded dynamically using MEF (Managed Extensibility Framework).
Allows: - Retrieving metadata for all available exporters - Resolving a specific exporter by its unique key

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IExporterCatalog.GetAll
member.summary: Retrieves metadata for all available exporters.
member.returns: A collection of describing all dynamically loaded exporters.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IExporterCatalog.GetByKey(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an exporter implementation by its unique key.
member.returns: An instance of if found; otherwise null.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IQuizExporter
member.summary: Defines a contract for exporting quizzes into various file formats.
member.remarks:
Implementations of this interface are responsible for generating file content for a given in a specific format (e.g., CSV, TXT, PDF).
Exporters are dynamically discovered using MEF and resolved through the .

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IQuizExporter.Export(QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Quiz)
member.summary: Generates an export file for the specified quiz.
member.returns: An containing the file content, file name and MIME type.
member.exception: Thrown if the provided quiz is null.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IQuizExporterMetadata
member.summary: Defines metadata associated with a quiz exporter implementation.
member.remarks:
Used by MEF (Managed Extensibility Framework) to describe exporter characteristics without instantiating the exporter itself.
This metadata is typically applied via ExportMetadata attributes and consumed by .

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IQuizExporterMetadata.Key
member.summary: Unique key identifying the exporter.
member.remarks: Used by clients when requesting export (e.g., "csv", "txt", "pdf").

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IQuizExporterMetadata.DisplayName
member.summary: Human-readable display name of the exporter.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IQuizExporterMetadata.FileExtension
member.summary: File extension associated with the exported format.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IQuizExporterMetadata.MimeType
member.summary: MIME type used when returning the exported file.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuestionRepository
member.summary: Defines data access operations for entities.
member.remarks: Provides querying and persistence operations for quiz questions. Typically used when creating or updating quizzes, especially for question recycling scenarios.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuestionRepository.SearchPagedAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches questions with pagination support.
member.param: Optional text used to filter questions by their content.
member.returns: A paged result containing matching questions.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuestionRepository.GetByIdsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{System.Guid})
member.summary: Retrieves questions by their identifiers.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuestionRepository.AddRangeAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Question})
member.summary: Adds multiple questions to the data store.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuestionRepository.AddAsync(QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Question)
member.summary: Adds a single question to the data store.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuizRepository
member.summary: Defines data access operations for entities.
member.remarks:
Provides querying and persistence operations for quizzes, including: - Retrieving paged quiz lists (without loading question details) - Retrieving a single quiz with its associated questions - Creating, updating, and deleting quizzes
Questions are associated with quizzes through the join entity.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuizRepository.GetPagedAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,QuizMaker.Domain.Enums.SortOrder)
member.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of quizzes.
member.param: Optional text used to filter quizzes by name.
Sort direction applied to the results.
member.returns: A paged result containing matching quizzes.
member.remarks: This method is intended for list views and should avoid loading full question details for performance reasons.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuizRepository.GetByIdWithQuestionsAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a quiz by its identifier including associated questions.
member.returns: A quiz including its associated questions if found; otherwise null.
member.remarks: Intended for quiz detail view and export operations where full question data is required.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuizRepository.AddAsync(QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Quiz)
member.summary: Adds a new quiz to the data store.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuizRepository.DeleteAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a quiz identified by the specified identifier.
member.remarks: Deleting a quiz should not delete the associated questions, only the quiz entity itself (typically via soft delete).

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuizRepository.UpdateAsync(QuizMaker.Domain.Entities.Quiz)
member.summary: Updates an existing quiz in the data store.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IUnitOfWork
member.summary: Defines a unit of work abstraction for coordinating data persistence.
member.remarks:
Ensures that multiple repository operations are committed as a single transactional operation.
Typically implemented using Entity Framework DbContext.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IUnitOfWork.SaveChangesAsync
member.summary: Persists all changes made within the current unit of work.
member.returns: The number of state entries written to the underlying data store.
member.remarks: All tracked changes across repositories are committed in a single transaction.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1
member.summary: Represents a paginated result set.
member.typeparam: Type of items contained in the result.
member.remarks: Encapsulates a collection of items along with pagination metadata, including total count, page information and navigation helpers.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{`0},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Total number of items across all pages.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.Items
member.summary: Items contained in the current page.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.TotalCount
member.summary: Total number of items across all pages.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.Page
member.summary: Current page number.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.PageSize
member.summary: Number of items per page.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.TotalPages
member.summary: Total number of available pages.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.HasPreviousPage
member.summary: Indicates whether a previous page exists.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.HasNextPage
member.summary: Indicates whether a next page exists.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.PreviousPage
member.summary: Gets the previous page number if available; otherwise null.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.NextPage
member.summary: Gets the next page number if available; otherwise null.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Domain.Paging.PagedResult`1.Empty(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an empty paged result.
